params._aggregators: The ordered aggregators corresponding to the list of _primitives
params._rateAssets: The ordered rate assets corresponding to the list of _primitives

params._baseAssetAmount: The base asset amount to convert

returns.isValid_: True if the rates used in calculations are deemed valid

calcLiveValue(address,uint256,address).details: Live and canonical values are the same for Chainlink

params._baseAssetAmount: The base asset amount to convert

returns.isValid_: True if the rates used in calculations are deemed valid

params._primitive: The primitive asset for which to get the aggregatorInfo value

getOwner().details: Ownership is deferred to the owner of the FundDeployer contract

getRateAssetForPrimitive(address).details: This isn't strictly necessary as WETH_TOKEN will be undefined and thus the RateAsset will be the 0-position of the enum (i.e. ETH), but it makes the behavior more explicit

returns.isSupported_: True if the asset is a supported primitive

params._aggregator: The Chainlink aggregator of which to check staleness

returns.rateIsStale_: True if the rate is considered stale

params._aggregators: The ordered aggregators corresponding to the list of _primitives

addPrimitives(address[],address[],uint8[.notice: Adds a list of primitives with the given aggregator and rateAsset values

calcCanonicalValue(address,uint256,addre.notice: Calculates the value of a base asset in terms of a quote asset (using a canonical rate)

calcLiveValue(address,uint256,address).notice: Calculates the value of a base asset in terms of a quote asset (using a live rate)

getAggregatorInfoForPrimitive(address).notice: Gets the aggregatorInfo variable value for a primitive

getOwner().notice: Gets the owner of this contract

getRateAssetForPrimitive(address).notice: Gets the rateAsset variable value for a primitive

getUnitForPrimitive(address).notice: Gets the unit variable value for a primitive

isSupportedAsset(address).notice: Checks whether an asset is a supported primitive of the price feed

rateIsStale(address).notice: Checks whether the current rate is considered stale for the specified aggregator

removePrimitives(address[]).notice: Removes a list of primitives from the feed

removeStalePrimitives(address[]).notice: Removes stale primitives from the feed

updatePrimitives(address[],address[]).notice: Updates the aggregators for given primitives

userdoc.notice: A price feed that uses Chainlink oracles as price sources
